review_title: An incredible learning experience affected by poor leadership
pros: - Freedom of action. - Ever changing challenges and situations to deal with. - Getting to work along with highly qualified people from different industries. - Working close to communities across the country. - Close interaction with the private and public sector at different provinces and locations.
cons: - Poor communication with team leader. - Lack of involvement in decisions that affected the team as a whole.

pros: international mind-set staff with open-minded people

review_title: Great team to have worked with.
pros: Fieldworks were the best for me and getting to interview customers, discussing with my team about the findings and coming up with a final report was always an achievement.
cons: I was in the research department, although I loved, working with teams and doing presentations more.

pros: Decent pays compared to its peers
cons: Project-based and normally the project has the duration only 1-2 years
